skills.skill: Basic Coding Skills (PowerBI, Alteryx, Tableau, SQL, RPA)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze different business inputs to advise on price levels across multiple markets.
Develop frameworks to guide pricing decisions for high volume quoting activity.
Manage and maintain credit risk exposures of assigned customer base.
Prepare and manage the monthly review deck and financial summary package for management and leadership.
Prepare monthly financial reporting and analysis and communicate business results in a clear, concise manner.
Collaborate with Global Business Services (GBS) team and division finance teams when reviewing results and deliverables.
Support finance business partners in delivery of monthly financial reporting & analysis to leadership.
Assist with development of business insights and ad hoc analysis.
Assist with development of business insights that will support profitable decision making and improvements across division.
Actively participate in cross-functional projects, providing relevant feedback & sharing best practices.
Prepare valuable financial analyses that provide new insights and drive profitable action across our manufacturing locations.
Support the Operations Finance team by preparing valuable financial analyses that provide new insights and drive profitable action across our manufacturing locations.

education_certification.credential: Eligible for full-time employment on or before Summer 2025. Legal authorization to work permanently in the United States for any employer without requiring a visa transfer or visa sponsorship.
